com.facebook.buck.util
Class ProcessExecutor

java.lang.Object
  com.facebook.buck.util.ProcessExecutor

public class ProcessExecutor
extends Object

Executes a Process and blocks until it is finished.

Method Detail

execute

public ProcessExecutor.Result execute(Process process)
Convenience method for execute(Process, boolean, boolean, boolean) with boolean values set to false.

execute

public ProcessExecutor.Result execute(Process process,
                                      boolean shouldRecordStdOut,
                                      boolean shouldPrintStdErr,
                                      boolean isSilent)
Executes the specified process.

Parameters:
process - The Process to execute.
shouldRecordStdOut - If true, then ProcessExecutor.Result.getStdOut() will be non-null in the returned value because it was recorded.
shouldPrintStdErr - If true, then the stderr of the process will be written directly to the stderr passed to the constructor of this executor.
